name: overland
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of travel) across the land in a vehicle, on foot, or on a horse; not by sea or air: an overland trip across Australia We travelled overland.

(of travel) across the land, and not by sea or air: They’re taking an overland trip across Canada.
